contents.title: Welcome to vueton
contents.description: Vueton is a Vue3 plugin that provides an integration with TON Blockchain. This library is inspired by the official react SDK @tonconnect/ui-react, but also have its own unique features.

children.value: Vueton is a Vue3 plugin that provides an integration with
. This library is inspired by the official react SDK
, but also have its own unique features.
It was initally created for the

contents.title: Setup
contents.description: Setup your Vue 3 project to work with TON.

children.value: Setup your Vue 3 project to work with TON.
It accepts three configurations for different libraries:
also can be a sync/async function that returns
instance. It is useful when you want to use a library like

props.code:
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'

const app = createApp(App)
app.use(vueton)

contents.title: Possible problems
contents.description: There is a list of problems you can face and which do not depend on the library itself.

children.value: There is a list of problems you can face and which do not depend on the library itself.
uses Node buffer implementation, so in order to use it in the browser, you need to use a polyfill like
client can not process accept complex responses from the endpoints. This problem is addressed here:
might reject some requests if you DApp sends too many requests in a short period of time. That's why
is used to retry the requests. However,
does not provide an access to the axios instance to configure retries. The problem is addressed here:
The two last mentioned problems can be fixed by applying
. Vueton can work with and without this patch.

contents.description: See how you can easilly integrate TON into your website to accept tips.

contents.title: TON Connect
contents.description: Here is a list of TON Connect utilities.

children.value: Here is a list of TON Connect utilities.
A button that provides the default TON Connect UI auth button.
Main composable providing the most cruscial vueton functionality.
TonClient instance wrapped in Vue ref. May be
if initialized with an async function and not completed yet.
Indicates if the plugin is connected to a wallet application / browser extension.
TON address of the currently connected wallet in hex format.
TON address of the currently connected wallet in user-friendly format.
Wrapper to send transaction using TonConnectUI with core interface.
Cleanup all subscriptions and listeners under the hood.
Hook to wait for the TON application to connect.
Hook to listen for user changing the wallet.

children.value: Here is a list of contracts utilities.
Utility function to wait for a contract to be deployed. It checks the contract deployment status every
: A function that checks the contract deployment status.
: Maximum number of checks. If the contract is not deployed after
Contains an opened contract instance whenever it is possible.
: A contract or a ref to a contract to open.
to the opened contract. May be
if the contract is not available yet or if
Waits for a contract to be opened. Might be useful with
An opened contract object unwrapped from the ref.

contents.title: High-level utils
contents.description: Here is 2 really useful high-level utilities that you can use in your projects.

children.value: Here is 2 really useful high-level utilities that you can use in your projects.
A high-level composable to paginate collections of TON contracts.
: Maximum number of items per iteration. (default: 3)
: A function that returns the total number of items as bigint.
: A function that returns a contract by its sequence number.
: A function that will be called before fetching the next page.
: Whether the current page is the last one.
: Whether the next page is loading.
A high-level composable to send messages in TON Blockchain.
: A function to send a message.
: A function to validate if the message can be sent before actually doing it.
: Hooks to be run on different stages of the message sending.
: A hook to be run before the message is sent.
: A hook to be run after the message is successfully sent. This hook will not be called if the message sending fails.
: A hook to be run after the message sending fails.
Synchronous result of the message sending.
: The current status of the message sending.
: Whether the message was successfully sent.
: Whether the message sending is in progress.
